name: Hogue Smith
review: Previously my teeth were crowded or crooked.These were not so good looking.After getting treated by Dr. Jakariya my teeth look better now.

name: Cyrus Nicole
review: My Wishdom teeth were giving me so much trouble.My daily life was getting affected by this.Dr. Jakariya treated me so well that I live my life happily now.

name: Francis Hagialok
review: For some reasons I needed dental implant.My friend suggested Dr. Jakariya and I got treated by him.I got 4 implants and they are working fine.

name: Elijah Naicker
review: Dr Jakariya is very good at teeth whitening.I took this treatment 3 times and every time he did it so well and I am very glad about that.

name: Brian Rook
review: I needed dental CT scan and without any thought I went to Dr. Jakariya and did it any hesitation.The job was done very well.

name: Austin Jenkins
review: I broke my two teeth playing football.My parents were so mad at me about that.They took me to Dr. Jakariya and he fixed my teeth and I am better now.
